CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 5, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "They Had Fun - Besides Pittsburghers, guests at the Dynamic Danettes Ball came from Cleveland, Ohio, Washington, Pa. and McKeesport. Some of the out-of-towners who had fun at the affair are pictured here.  Seated left to right: Dr. Harry Lanauze, James Thomas, Virginia Smith, Vernon Crawford and Eddie Watts.  Standing from left: Calvin Blair, Willie Watts, Hazel Crawford, Yvonne Lanauze and Charles Carlson."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of out-of-town guests, from left, seated: Dr. Harry Lanauze, James Thomas, Virginia Smith, Vernon Crawford, and Eddie Watts; standing: Calvin Blair, Willie Watts, Hazel Crawford, Yvonne Lanauze, and Charles Carlson, posed in Roosevelt Hotel for Danettes Mardi Gras Ball
